attributes.additional_details: Places of worship are an ESSENTIAL part of this countries way of living and heritage  and they need to be opened now.  Many people prayed for the Prime minister when he was ill, so you have to realise the power of prayer.
attributes.background: Re-open places of worship as they are essential to the well being of this country, which was built on Christian foundations.  These should never have been closed so please re-open them now!
